title: What is your opinion on isochronic tones? - Quora

response.answer_text: The same as my thoughts about anything artificial, man made, not natural. What is its impact on my organism? My organism is a biological system of adaptations to a natural environment, and the more unnatural - artificial, man made - the incoming signal, the more likely the organism will have to struggle to adapt to that unnatural signal. It’s a bit like highly processed food; not exactly poison, but over time enough doses and it becomes toxic.

Isochoric tones are tones of the same frequency that are separated by short intervals. This creates a rhythmic pulsing sound. Isochoric tones are used in the process of brain wave entrainment, which is when your brain waves are deliberately manipulated to sync with an external stimulus like a sound or image.
